author: folguera
body:
This PR includes the following changes: 
 - Re-design of the HLTMuonL2SelectorForIO to use track links and to apply a L3 filter on the fly.
 - Some modifications on TSGForOI to simplify the code and to decide whether to run with hits or not depending on the L2 parameters.
- The updated and optimised customisation function. 
- Some naming conventions and cosmetics in the previous mentioned classes.
title: Muon HLT IterL3 code
